*This promotion is open to U.S. and Canadian residents 18 years of age or older.  
No purchases or offers are required to complete, and traveler is responsible for 
applicable hotel taxes.  See terms and conditions inside for complete 
details on this promotion.
This advertisement is brought to you by ExperienceSummerBayResorts. To discontinue future offers,click here or write to ExperienceSummerBayResorts, 3300 W Lake Mary Blvd, Ste 300, Lake Mary, FL 32746.This advertising material is being used for the purpose of soliciting sales of vacation ownership periods.
